name: Robot Simulation: Vice Town
description:
Do you want to play the role of a powerful robot? And enjoy unlimited interesting robot fights.

Available Robot Car Fight’s gameplay:

Robot transformation
Fly on the sky
Robot fight each other
Update robot and ultimate car to win any fight

Game features:

Addictive gameplay
Real action robot game
Bright graphics & animation
Several Challenging modes to play

Death or win in glory!
Hope you enjoy Robot Car Fight !
